author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

As a follow up of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37361#pullrequestreview-939397453 I think that some simplification of the usage of constants in HGCalCellUV is possible
This PR represents a possible implementation, based on the suggestion reported in that comment

#### PR validation:

It builds
No changes are expected anywhere

@Pruthvi-ch
title: Simplify usage of constants in HGCalCellUV
